1. Introduction¶

Oncilla is the documentation building helper package of Oncilla, Color, Manager, Umbra, sIBL_GUI and sIBL_Reporter.

With a single monolithic manual / help reStructuredText file used as input, an html manual file and the complete Sphinx documentation will be generated:

  • Source manual reStructuredText file example
  • Output manual html file example
  • Output sphinx documentation example
